page.topic: Important Changes in Alpha Five Version 11
page.description: These articles discuss major changes in Alpha Five Version 11, including breaking changes and obsolete features that must be updated in applications being migrated from Alpha Five V10 or older. Note that more recent releases of Alpha Anywhere may have introduced additional changes that will require additional work to migrate your application to Alpha Anywhere.

see.ref: Server Context Object (Request, Response, Server, and Security objects)
